trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Muskegon
There were no other sightings in Muskegon on or around May 15th 1993
divs: sighting detailsi have never told anyone other than close friends about this event. i've seen things about mufon on t.v. i've always felt a little weird about telling my friends about this since as you can imagine how it sounds to someone who has never seen anything. i remember everything about this event other than the exact date. it was warm outside and i was a senior in high school. so it had to of been early fall 92', or late spring 93'. it was between 12 midnight and 2 a.m. i was playing basketball outside in one of my friend's parent's driveway. there was 4 of us playing. after playing for about an hour we were thirsty, so the other three went inside to get a drink. i stayed outside because i felt uncomfortable about going inside since my friend's mother had yelled at us earlier about being too loud. i continued to shoot the basketball in the driveway. after a few minutes i started to notice this "humming" sound. it seemed to get louder and louder and then seemed to be coming from above me. i then looked straight up towards the noise, that's when i seen the disc. it was hovering above me at about 50-75 ft. it was just above the tops of the big oak trees that were in the yard. it was made of metal, i would say aluminum. i would place the diameter of the disc at 20-30 ft. it had one light in the center of the disc, a blueish\white light. it wasn't a spot light like you see on t.v., it was just a light like on airplanes. it looked like the skin of an airplane. pieces of aluminum sheets. to me it looked man-made. i'm not sure how long it had been hovering above me before i looked up, but i do know that after i looked up i said aloud "holy s***" and before i got the whole phrase out it took off. i have never seen anything move that fast before, especially from a dead stop. it shot off to roughly where the road was at the end of the driveway. a distance of about 20-30 yards. it's hovering height remained the same. it moved that fast in the blink of an eye! it came to a complete stop too. i know that inertia would kill someone inside after doing what i seen it do. i started walking down the driveway towards it, kind of in disbelief. after i got about half-way down the driveway it started moving slowly over the trees and houses, like it was done with me or something. i jogged down the road for a while trying to keep it in sight but disappeared after a while towards the north-west. when i got back to the house, all the guys were outside questioning me where had i been and why i was out of breathe. i told them what i had seen, but i could tell they didn't believe me. i haven't seen anything like it since. this all took place by wolf lake, outside of the city of muskegon. i would like to know if any other reports came from the same time in the same area. this has been something that's kind of haunted me every since it happened.
Summary: I was deliberately "targeted" by an aluminum looking disc for observation.
